00001 package com.placesandplaces;

00003 import java.io.IOException;
00004 
00005 import com.rabbitmq.client.Channel;
00006 import com.rabbitmq.client.Connection;
00007 import com.rabbitmq.client.ConnectionFactory;
00008 
00012 public abstract class IConnectToRabbitMQ {
00013         // declare rabbitmq variables
00014         public String mServer;
00015         public String mExchange;
00016 
00017         protected Channel mModel = null;
00018         protected Connection mConnection;
00019 
00020         protected boolean Running;
00021 
00022         protected String MyExchangeType;
00023 
00024         public IConnectToRabbitMQ(String server, String exchange,
00025                         String exchangeType) {
00026                 mServer = server;
00027                 mExchange = exchange;
00028                 MyExchangeType = exchangeType;
00029         }
00030 
00031         public void Dispose() {
00032                 Running = false;
00033                 try {
00034 
00035                         if (mConnection != null) {
00036                                 mConnection.close();
00037                         }// end if
00038 
00039                         if (mModel != null) {
00040                                 mModel.abort();
00041                         }// end if
00042                 }// end try
00043                 catch (IOException e) {
00044                         e.printStackTrace();
00045                 }
00046         }
00047 
00048         public boolean connectToRabbitMQ() {
00049                 if (mModel != null && mModel.isOpen())// already declared
00050                         return true;
00051                 try {
00052                         ConnectionFactory connectionFactory = new ConnectionFactory();
00053                         connectionFactory.setHost(mServer);
00054                         mConnection = connectionFactory.newConnection();
00055                         mModel = mConnection.createChannel();
00056                         mModel.exchangeDeclare(mExchange, MyExchangeType, true);
00057                         return true;
00058                 } catch (Exception e) {
00059                         e.printStackTrace();
00060                         return false;
00061                 }
00062         }
00063 }
